description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows kernel elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43570):

1. Download the relevant KB update for your Windows build from the links below.
2. Install the update to apply the security enhancements.
3. Restart your system to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update resolves a critical use after free vulnerability in the Windows kernel, which could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. 

**Update Packages**:
- For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280) 
- For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64 and 32-bit): [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273) 
- For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280) 
- For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284) 
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285) 
- For Windows 10 for 32-bit Systems: [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286) 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system version corresponds to the specific KB updates before installation.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
